```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Create a Root to Extract Files 
if(Sys.info()["sysname"] == "Windows"){ #If operating system is "Windows" use G: Drive
  team_path2 <- "G:/"
} else { # If it is not (i.e. Mac), use the Google Drive File Stream
  team_path2 <- "/Volumes/GoogleDrive/"
}

#Create the Full File Path
path2 <- paste0(team_path2, "Shared drives/Bren GP 2020 maricultura/Data/Raw_Data/Renamed_Shapefiles_20191025")
```

Read in Layer with Correct Sirgas 2000 Polyconic CRS
```{r}
# Read in Ambiente
silviculture <- read_sf(dsn = path2, 
                     layer = "silvicultura")

st_crs(silviculture)
silviculture_new <- st_transform(silviculture, CRS("+init=epsg:5880"))

st_crs(silviculture_new)


st_crs(silviculture_new)




```
